otp.instructions: We have sent a code to your email. Please enter it below.
otp.minutes: The code is valid for {{minutes}} minutes.
otp.title: Verify your email
otp.error: The entered code is incorrect or invalid.

successfullyLoggedOut.detail: You have been successfully logged out.

sessionExpired.detail: Your session has expired. Please log in again.

updateProfileFailed.detail: Your name could not be updated. Please try again.

updatePasswordFailed.detail: Your password could not be updated. Please try again.

error.detail: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

autoSignInFailed.detail: Your session could not be restored automatically. Please sign in manually.

emailLoginFailed.detail: Signing in with email and password failed. Please check your credentials and try again.

otpSendFailed.detail: The verification code could not be sent to your email. Please try again.

otpInvalid.detail: The entered code is invalid or has expired. Please request a new one.

providerLoginFailed.detail: Signing in with an external provider failed. Please try again.

logoutFailed.detail: You could not be signed out successfully. Please try again.

accountMissing.prefix: Don't have a TUMApply account yet?

error.authenticationFailed: Sign in failed! Please check your credentials and try again.

accountPresent.prefix: You already have a TUMApply account?
